CloneUrlHttp.Description:
The URL to use for cloning the repository over HTTPS, such as
                        https://codecommit.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/v1/repos/MyDemoRepo.

CloneUrlSsh.Description:
The URL to use for cloning the repository over SSH, such as
                        ssh://git-codecommit.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/v1/repos//v1/repos/MyDemoRepo.
